Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

TestPotentialmap.cxx
1 // Adapted from TestField.cxx
2 
3 #include "KCommandLineTokenizer.hh"
4 #include "KXMLTokenizer.hh"
5 #include "KVariableProcessor.hh"
6 #include "KFormulaProcessor.hh"
7 #include "KIncludeProcessor.hh"
8 #include "KLoopProcessor.hh"
9 #include "KConditionProcessor.hh"
10 #include "KPrintProcessor.hh"
11 #include "KTagProcessor.hh"
12 #include "KElementProcessor.hh"
13 
14 #include "KToolbox.h"
15 #include "KSObject.h"
16 #include "KSEvent.h"
17 #include "KSRootMagneticField.h"
18 #include "KSMainMessage.h"
19 
20 #include "KSFieldFinder.h"
21 
22 #include "KConst.h"
23 
24 #include "KRandom.h"
25 
26 #include "TApplication.h"
27 #include "TFile.h"
28 #include "TCanvas.h"
29 #include "TH1D.h"
30 #include "TH3D.h"
31 
32 #include "TGraph.h"
33 #include "TMultiGraph.h"
34 #include "KEMVTKFieldCanvas.hh"
35 
36 #include <sstream>
37 
38 using std::stringstream;
39 
40 using namespace Kassiopeia;
41 using namespace katrin;
42 
43 int main( int argc, char** argv )
44 {
45  // read in xml file
46  KCommandLineTokenizer tCommandLine;
47  tCommandLine.ProcessCommandLine( argc, argv );
48 
49  KXMLTokenizer tXMLTokenizer;
50  KVariableProcessor tVariableProcessor( tCommandLine.GetVariables() );
51  KFormulaProcessor tFormulaProcessor;
52  KIncludeProcessor tIncludeProcessor;
53  KLoopProcessor tLoopProcessor;
54  KConditionProcessor tConditionProcessor;
55  KPrintProcessor tPrintProcessor;
56  KTagProcessor tTagProcessor;
57  KElementProcessor tElementProcessor;
58 
59  tVariableProcessor.InsertAfter( &tXMLTokenizer );
60  tFormulaProcessor.InsertAfter( &tVariableProcessor );
61  tIncludeProcessor.InsertAfter( &tFormulaProcessor );
62  tLoopProcessor.InsertAfter( &tIncludeProcessor );
63  tConditionProcessor.InsertAfter( &tLoopProcessor );
64  tPrintProcessor.InsertAfter( &tConditionProcessor );
65  tTagProcessor.InsertAfter( &tPrintProcessor );
66  tElementProcessor.InsertAfter( &tTagProcessor );
67 
68  // read in command line parameters
69  if( argc <= 2 )
70  {
71  mainmsg( eWarning ) << ret;
72  mainmsg << "usage:" << ret;
73  mainmsg << "TestPotentialmap <direct_field_component> <potentialmap_field_component> [config_file] " << ret;
74  mainmsg << ret;
75  mainmsg << "default field components found in " << CONFIG_DEFAULT_DIR << "/Validation/TestPotentialmap.xml" << ret;
76  mainmsg << eom;
77  return -1;
78  }
79 
80  string tPathDirect( argv[ 1 ] );
81  string tPathPotentialmap( argv[ 2 ] );
82 
83  KTextFile tInputFile;
84  if ( argc >= 4 )
85  {
86  tInputFile.AddToBases( argv[ 3 ] );
87  tInputFile.AddToPaths( string( "." ) );
88  }
89  else
90  {
91  tInputFile.AddToBases( "TestPotentialmap.xml" );
92  tInputFile.AddToPaths( string( CONFIG_DEFAULT_DIR ) + string( "/Validation" ) );
93  }
94  tXMLTokenizer.ProcessFile( &tInputFile );
95 
96  unsigned int tCount = 100;
97  bool tPlotPotential = true;
98  bool tPlotField = true;
99 
100  // initialize electric field
101  KSElectricField* tRootElectricFieldDirect = getElectricField( tPathDirect );
102 
103  if (tRootElectricFieldDirect)
104  {
105  tRootElectricFieldDirect->Initialize();
106  tRootElectricFieldDirect->Activate();
107  }
108 
109  KSElectricField* tRootElectricFieldFromMap = getElectricField( tPathPotentialmap );
110 
111  if (tRootElectricFieldFromMap)
112  {
113  tRootElectricFieldFromMap->Initialize();
114  tRootElectricFieldFromMap->Activate();
115  }
116 
117  KThreeVector tPoint,tElectricFieldDirect,tElectricFieldFromMap;
118  double tElectricPotentialDirect, tElectricPotentialFromMap;
119 
120  for (unsigned int i=0;i<tCount;i++)
121  {
122  tPoint[0] = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform(-0.045,0.045);
123  tPoint[1] = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform(-0.045,0.045);
124  tPoint[2] = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform(-0.045,0.045);
125 
126  if (tRootElectricFieldDirect)
127  {
128  tRootElectricFieldDirect->CalculatePotential(tPoint,0,tElectricPotentialDirect);
129  tRootElectricFieldDirect->CalculateField(tPoint,0,tElectricFieldDirect);
130  }
131 
132  if (tRootElectricFieldFromMap)
133  {
134  tRootElectricFieldFromMap->CalculatePotential(tPoint,0,tElectricPotentialFromMap);
135  tRootElectricFieldFromMap->CalculateField(tPoint,0,tElectricFieldFromMap);
136  }
137 
138  std::cout<<"Point: "<<tPoint<<std::endl;
139  if (tRootElectricFieldDirect)
140  {
141  std::cout<<" Direct Electric Potential: "<<tElectricPotentialDirect<<std::endl;
142  std::cout<<" Direct Electric Field: "<<tElectricFieldDirect<<std::endl;
143  }
144  if (tRootElectricFieldFromMap)
145  {
146  std::cout<<" Mapped Electric Potential: "<<tElectricPotentialFromMap<<std::endl;
147  std::cout<<" Mapped Electric Field: "<<tElectricFieldFromMap<<std::endl;
148  }
149  if (tRootElectricFieldDirect && tRootElectricFieldFromMap)
150  {
151  std::cout<<" Electric Potential Diff: "<<(tElectricPotentialDirect-tElectricPotentialFromMap)<<std::endl;
152  std::cout<<" Electric Field Diff: "<<(tElectricFieldDirect-tElectricFieldFromMap)<<std::endl;
153  }
154  }
155 
156  if (tRootElectricFieldDirect && tRootElectricFieldFromMap)
157  {
158  double z1 = -0.045;
159  double z2 = 0.045;
160  double x1 = 0.;
161  double x2 = 0.045;
162 
163  double dx = 1.e-4;
164  double dz = 1.e-4;
165 
166  if (tPlotPotential)
167  {
168  KEMField::KEMFieldCanvas* fieldCanvas = NULL;
169 
170  fieldCanvas = new KEMField::KEMVTKFieldCanvas(z1,z2,x1,x2,1.e30,true);
171 
172  if (fieldCanvas)
173  {
174  int N_x = (int)((x2-x1)/dx);
175  int N_z = (int)((z2-z1)/dz);
176 
177  int counter = 0;
178  int countermax = N_z*N_x;
179 
180  std::vector<double> x_;
181  std::vector<double> y_;
182  std::vector<double> V1_, V2_, V_;
183 
184  double spacing[2] = {dz,dx};
185 
186  double phiDirect, phiFromMap, phiDelta;
187 
188  clock_t start, end;
189  double time;
190 
191  std::cout<<"Computing potential differences on a "<<N_x<<" by "<<N_z<<" grid ("<<countermax<<" points)"<<std::endl;
192 
193  start = clock();
194 
195  for (int g=0;g<N_z;g++)
196  x_.push_back(z1+g*spacing[0]+spacing[0]/2);
197 
198  for (int h=0;h<N_x;h++)
199  y_.push_back(x1+h*spacing[1]+spacing[1]/2);
200 
201  for (int g=0;g<N_z;g++)
202  {
203  for (int h=0;h<N_x;h++)
204  {
205  double P[3] = {y_[h],0.,x_[g]};
206 
207  tRootElectricFieldDirect->CalculatePotential(P,0,phiDirect);
208  tRootElectricFieldFromMap->CalculatePotential(P,0,phiFromMap);
209  phiDelta = phiDirect - phiFromMap;
210 
211  counter++;
212  if (counter%10==0)
213  {
214  std::cout<<"\r";
215  std::cout<<int((float)counter/countermax*100)<<" %";
216  std::cout.flush();
217  }
218 
219  V1_.push_back(phiDirect);
220  V2_.push_back(phiFromMap);
221  V_.push_back(phiDelta);
222  }
223  }
224  std::cout<<"\r";
225  std::cout.flush();
226 
227  end = clock();
228  std::cout<<"Finished computing potential differences"<<std::endl;
229  time = ((double)(end - start))/CLOCKS_PER_SEC; // time in seconds
230  std::cout<<" total time spent = "<<time<<std::endl;
231  time /= (double)(countermax);
232  std::cout<<" time per direct potential evaluation = "<<time<<std::endl;
233 
234  fieldCanvas->DrawFieldMap(x_,y_,V_,false,.5);
235  fieldCanvas->LabelAxes("z (m)","r (m)","#Delta#Phi (V)");
236  fieldCanvas->SaveAs("VPotentialmapPhiDifferenceMap_rz.png");
237 
238  fieldCanvas = new KEMField::KEMVTKFieldCanvas(z1,z2,x1,x2,1.e30,true);
239  fieldCanvas->DrawFieldMap(x_,y_,V1_,false,.5);
240  fieldCanvas->LabelAxes("z (m)","r (m)","#Phi_{direct} (V)");
241  fieldCanvas->SaveAs("VPotentialmapPhiDirectMap_rz.png");
242 
243  fieldCanvas = new KEMField::KEMVTKFieldCanvas(z1,z2,x1,x2,1.e30,true);
244  fieldCanvas->DrawFieldMap(x_,y_,V2_,false,.5);
245  fieldCanvas->LabelAxes("z (m)","r (m)","#Phi_{fromMap} (V)");
246  fieldCanvas->SaveAs("VPotentialmapPhiResultMap_rz.png");
247  }
248  }
249 
250  if (tPlotField)
251  {
252  KEMField::KEMFieldCanvas* fieldCanvas = NULL;
253 
254  fieldCanvas = new KEMField::KEMVTKFieldCanvas(z1,z2,x1,x2,1.e30,true);
255 
256  if (fieldCanvas)
257  {
258  int N_x = (int)((x2-x1)/dx);
259  int N_z = (int)((z2-z1)/dz);
260 
261  int counter = 0;
262  int countermax = N_z*N_x;
263 
264  std::vector<double> x_;
265  std::vector<double> y_;
266  std::vector<double> V1_, V2_, V_;
267 
268  double spacing[2] = {dz,dx};
269 
270  KThreeVector fieldDirect, fieldFromMap, fieldDelta;
271 
272  clock_t start, end;
273  double time;
274 
275  std::cout<<"Computing field differences on a "<<N_x<<" by "<<N_z<<" grid ("<<countermax<<" points)"<<std::endl;
276 
277  start = clock();
278 
279  for (int g=0;g<N_z;g++)
280  x_.push_back(z1+g*spacing[0]+spacing[0]/2);
281 
282  for (int h=0;h<N_x;h++)
283  y_.push_back(x1+h*spacing[1]+spacing[1]/2);
284 
285  for (int g=0;g<N_z;g++)
286  {
287  for (int h=0;h<N_x;h++)
288  {
289  double P[3] = {y_[h],0.,x_[g]};
290 
291  tRootElectricFieldDirect->CalculateField(P,0,fieldDirect);
292  tRootElectricFieldFromMap->CalculateField(P,0,fieldFromMap);
293  fieldDelta = fieldDirect - fieldFromMap;
294 
295  counter++;
296  if (counter%10==0)
297  {
298  std::cout<<"\r";
299  std::cout<<int((float)counter/countermax*100)<<" %";
300  std::cout.flush();
301  }
302 
303  V1_.push_back(fieldDirect.Magnitude());
304  V2_.push_back(fieldFromMap.Magnitude());
305  V_.push_back(fieldDelta.Magnitude());
306  }
307  }
308  std::cout<<"\r";
309  std::cout.flush();
310 
311  end = clock();
312  std::cout<<"Finished computing field differences"<<std::endl;
313  time = ((double)(end - start))/CLOCKS_PER_SEC; // time in seconds
314  std::cout<<" total time spent = "<<time<<std::endl;
315  time /= (double)(countermax);
316  std::cout<<" time per direct field evaluation = "<<time<<std::endl;
317 
318  fieldCanvas->DrawFieldMap(x_,y_,V_,false,.5);
319  fieldCanvas->LabelAxes("z (m)","r (m)","#DeltaE (V)");
320  fieldCanvas->SaveAs("VPotentialmapFieldDifferenceMap_rz.png");
321 
322  fieldCanvas = new KEMField::KEMVTKFieldCanvas(z1,z2,x1,x2,1.e30,true);
323  fieldCanvas->DrawFieldMap(x_,y_,V1_,false,.5);
324  fieldCanvas->LabelAxes("z (m)","r (m)","E_{direct} (V)");
325  fieldCanvas->SaveAs("VPotentialmapFieldDirectMap_rz.png");
326 
327  fieldCanvas = new KEMField::KEMVTKFieldCanvas(z1,z2,x1,x2,1.e30,true);
328  fieldCanvas->DrawFieldMap(x_,y_,V2_,false,.5);
329  fieldCanvas->LabelAxes("z (m)","r (m)","E_{fromMap} (V)");
330  fieldCanvas->SaveAs("VPotentialmapFieldResultMap_rz.png");
331  }
332  }
333  }
334 
335  // deinitialize electric field
336  if (tRootElectricFieldDirect)
337  {
338  tRootElectricFieldDirect->Deactivate();
339  tRootElectricFieldDirect->Deinitialize();
340  }
341 
342  if (tRootElectricFieldFromMap)
343  {
344  tRootElectricFieldFromMap->Deactivate();
345  tRootElectricFieldFromMap->Deinitialize();
346  }
347 
348 
349  return 0;
350 }
